generated.","_feeGasLimit":"Gas limit at which fee will be capped.","_feeGasPrice":"Gas price at which fee will be calculated.","_rlpParentNodes":"Storage merkle proof to verify message declaration on the origin chain.","_withdrawer":"Address of the withdrawer account."},"return":"messageHash_ Message Hash     * \\pre `_amount` is not 0. \\pre `_beneficiary` address is not 0. \\pre `_withdrawer` address is not 0. \\pre `_rlpParentNodes` is not 0     * \\post Adds a new entry in `inbox` mapping storage variable. The value is      set as `true` for `messagehash_` in `inbox` mapping. The      `messageHash_` is calculated by `MessageInbox.confirmMessage`. \\post Update the MessageInbox.inboxNonces storage mapping variable by      incrementing the value for `msg.sender` by one. \\post Transfers the `most` token to the `msg.sender` address as a fees.      The `fees` amount is calculated by `ERC20GatewayBase::reward()` \\post Transfer the `most` token to the `_beneficiary` address. The      transfer amount calculated as `_amount-fees`"},"declareOpenKernel(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"In case of chain halting when new Core is created, then new kernel     can be opened at the same height. address should not be 0         - Either Kernel height should equal currentMetablockHeight plus           one or kernel can be opened at same height in case of chain nodes.documentation:
@notice Function to declare open kernel in consensus gateway.
     * @dev In case of chain halting when new Core is created, then new kernel
     can be opened at the same height.
     In normal cases, since this function is called by consensus, we can
     trust that same height will not be passed.
     *      Function requires:
         - Only consensus can call
         - Core address should not be 0
         - Either Kernel height should equal currentMetablockHeight plus
           one or kernel can be opened at same height in case of chain
           halting.
     * @param _core Core contract address.
@param _feeGasPrice Fee gas price.
@param _feeGasLimit Fee gas limit.
     * @return messageHash_ Message hash.
nodes.name: declareOpenKernel

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Withdraw amount should be greater than 0."

arguments.value: Token transfer to the beneficiary must succeed.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Token transfer to the beneficiary must succeed."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Confirm withdraw in order to transfer most.
     * @param _amount MOST token amount for withdrawal
@param _beneficiary Address of beneficiary where tokens will be withdrawn.
@param _feeGasPrice Gas price at which fee will be calculated.
@param _feeGasLimit Gas limit at which fee will be capped.
@param _blockNumber Block number of Aux chain against which storage
proof is generated.
@param _withdrawer Address of the withdrawer account.
@param _rlpParentNodes Storage merkle proof to verify message declaration
on the origin chain.
     * @return messageHash_ Message Hash
     * \pre `_amount` is not 0.
\pre `_beneficiary` address is not 0.
\pre `_withdrawer` address is not 0.
\pre `_rlpParentNodes` is not 0
     * \post Adds a new entry in `inbox` mapping storage variable. The value is
      set as `true` for `messagehash_` in `inbox` mapping. The
      `messageHash_` is calculated by `MessageInbox.confirmMessage`.
\post Update the MessageInbox.inboxNonces storage mapping variable by
      incrementing the value for `msg.sender` by one.
\post Transfers the `most` token to the `msg.sender` address as a fees.
      The `fees` amount is calculated by `ERC20GatewayBase::reward()`
\post Transfer the `most` token to the `_beneficiary` address. The
      transfer amount calculated as `_amount-fees`
nodes.name: confirmWithdraw

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the remote gateway latest proven block number.
     * @return blockNumber_ Remote gateway latest proven block number.
nodes.name: getRemoteGatewayLatestProvenBlockNumber

@notice Confirm withdraw in order to transfer most.
     * @param _amount MOST token amount for withdrawal

@param _feeGasPrice Gas price at which fee will be calculated.
@param _feeGasLimit Gas limit at which fee will be capped.
@param _blockNumber Block number of Aux chain against which storage
proof is generated.
@param _withdrawer Address of the withdrawer account.
@param _rlpParentNodes Storage merkle proof to verify message declaration
on the origin chain.
     * @return messageHash_ Message Hash
     * \pre `_amount` is not 0.
\pre `_beneficiary` address is not 0.
\pre `_withdrawer` address is not 0.
\pre `_rlpParentNodes` is not 0
     * \post Adds a new entry in `inbox` mapping storage variable. The value is
      set as `true` for `messagehash_` in `inbox` mapping. The
      `messageHash_` is calculated by `MessageInbox.confirmMessage`.
\post Update the MessageInbox.inboxNonces storage mapping variable by
      incrementing the value for `msg.sender` by one.
\post Transfers the `most` token to the `msg.sender` address as a fees.
      The `fees` amount is calculated by `ERC20GatewayBase::reward()`
\post Transfer the `most` token to the `_beneficiary` address. The
      transfer amount calculated as `_amount-fees`

params._beneficiary: Address of beneficiary where tokens will be withdrawn.
params._blockNumber: Block number of Aux chain against which storage proof is generated.
params._feeGasLimit: Gas limit at which fee will be capped.
params._feeGasPrice: Gas price at which fee will be calculated.
params._rlpParentNodes: Storage merkle proof to verify message declaration on the origin chain.

confirmWithdraw(uint256,address,uint256,.return: messageHash_ Message Hash     * \pre `_amount` is not 0. \pre `_beneficiary` address is not 0. \pre `_withdrawer` address is not 0. \pre `_rlpParentNodes` is not 0     * \post Adds a new entry in `inbox` mapping storage variable. The value is      set as `true` for `messagehash_` in `inbox` mapping. The      `messageHash_` is calculated by `MessageInbox.confirmMessage`. \post Update the MessageInbox.inboxNonces storage mapping variable by      incrementing the value for `msg.sender` by one. \post Transfers the `most` token to the `msg.sender` address as a fees.      The `fees` amount is calculated by `ERC20GatewayBase::reward()` \post Transfer the `most` token to the `_beneficiary` address. The      transfer amount calculated as `_amount-fees`

declareOpenKernel(address,uint256,uint25.details: In case of chain halting when new Core is created, then new kernel     can be opened at the same height.     In normal cases, since this function is called by consensus, we can     trust that same height will not be passed.     *      Function requires:         - Only consensus can call         - Core address should not be 0         - Either Kernel height should equal currentMetablockHeight plus           one or kernel can be opened at same height in case of chain           halting.

params._amount: MOST token deposit amount in atto.
params._beneficiary: Address of beneficiary on auxiliary chain.
params._feeGasLimit: Fee gas limit at which rewards will be calculated.
params._feeGasPrice: Fee gas price at which rewards will be calculated.

getRemoteGatewayLatestProvenBlockNumber(.return: blockNumber_ Remote gateway latest proven block number.

params._kernelHash: Hash of kernel at given height.

setup(bytes32,address,address,address,ui.details: - Function can only be called once is ensured by setup function of       message box.     - Validations for input parameters are done in message box setup method.

params._maxStorageRootItems: Maximum number of storage roots stored.
params._outboxStorageIndex: Outbox storage index of consensus cogateway.

confirmWithdraw(uint256,address,uint256,.notice: Confirm withdraw in order to transfer most.

declareOpenKernel(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Function to declare open kernel in consensus gateway.

deposit(uint256,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit funds to mint on auxiliary chain. Depositor needs to        approve this contract with the deposit amount.

getRemoteGatewayLatestProvenBlockNumber(.notice: Gets the remote gateway latest proven block number.

hashChannelIdentifier(bytes32,address,ad.notice: Generate channel identifier hash from the input params

hashDepositIntent(address,uint256,addres.notice: It returns hash of deposit intent.

hashWithdrawIntent(address,address,uint2.notice: It returns hash of withdraw intent.

inboxMessageHash(bytes32,uint256,uint256.notice: Generate inbox message hash from the input params

outboxMessageHash(bytes32,uint256,uint25.notice: Generate outbox message hash from the input params
